SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rn, b.* FROM ( SELECT A.p_code AS p_code, A.p_name AS p_name, A.b_code AS b_code, b.b_name AS b_name, A.s_code AS s_code, c.s_name AS s_name, A.p_cost AS p_cost
FROM product A LEFT OUTER JOIN big_code b ON a.b_code = b.b_code LEFT OUTER JOIN small_code c ON a.s_code = c.s_code
WHERE 1=1
AND a.p_code LIKE '%' || #{p_code} || '%'
AND a.p_name LIKE '%' || #{p_name} || '%'
AND a.b_code LIKE '%' || #{b_code} || '%'
AND a.s_code LIKE '%' || #{s_code} || '%'
AND a.p_cost LIKE '%' || #{p_cost} || '%'
ORDER BY A.p_code ASC ) b ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
